attributes.action: Councils should ONLY plant wild bee friendly flowers.
attributes.additional_details: Bee's are dyeing out of our landscape, and the majority of plants planted by councils are not pollinator insect friendly. It is believed that most bee's are dyeing as a result of loss of habitat and malnutrition. I purpose that the government legislates councils to only plant native and wildlife friendly plants. Please share this via Facebook and Twitter to spread the word!
